Name: Bull's Blood
Ingredients: 15 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
30 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Orange fruitiness fortified with cognac and white rum. Fruity but not a sweetie.
Nutrition: One serving of Bull's Blood contains 195 calories
